name: Riki's Inflation Game 2
description:
RIG2 is a inflation platformer. You can jump, shoot, and inflate your character.

Your objective is to get through the turrets and see what's beyond the door.

Can you get to the end without popping?

* Current versions of the game were made with GameMaker 7, so they run best on Windows 7 and older. *

You can download extra characters and levels at https://hijokegames.com/rig2

-----
The original game idea and included playable characters by Sdwaggy
